about.description:
ASCII art is also known as "computer text art".
It involves the smart placement of typed special characters or
letters to make a visual shape that is spread over multiple lines of text.
ART is a Python lib for text converting to ASCII art fancy.

ASCII art is also known as "computer text art".
It involves the smart placement of typed special characters or
letters to make a visual shape that is spread over multiple lines of text.
ART is a Python lib for text converting to ASCII art fancy.

name: ascii-art
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ascii-art" %}
{% set version = "6.4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/art/art-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 417fea674bff8cea7ed058291ad1b81a6032dfce5152f28e629fa4a798a2c14c

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0
  entry_points:
    - art = art.__main__:main

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  imports:
    - art
  commands:
    - pip check
    - art test2
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://www.ascii-art.site
  summary: ASCII Art Library For Python
  dev_url: https://github.com/sepandhaghighi/art
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    ASCII art is also known as "computer text art".
    It involves the smart placement of typed special characters or
    letters to make a visual shape that is spread over multiple lines of text.
    ART is a Python lib for text converting to ASCII art fancy.
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - thewchan
    - sepandhaghighi
    - sadrasabouri
